description: Yeehaa is a seasoned tech manager and consultant with a strong background in software engineering and project management. An alumnus of top-tier institutions, they combine academic insights with practical expertise to drive innovation and efficiency. Yeehaa's work focuses on ecosystem architecture, exploring themes of decentralization, resilience, and interconnectedness. Their blog posts discuss topics ranging from biological ecosystems to internet fragmentation and sustainable innovation. Yeehaa also curates courses, such as "Groom Your Ecosystem," emphasizing leadership, adaptability, and creativity in fostering cohesive environments.
blurb: Yeehaa: Tech manager and consultant driving innovation through ecosystem architecture. Explores decentralization, resilience, and sustainable solutions in technology and beyond.
